long_description: A Patagonia classic, the Shelled Synchilla is a versatile bomber-style jacket made from durable, water-resistant nylon with a soft fleece lining. It'll be your spring and fall buddy for outdoor fun. Versatile wind-resistant nylon shell is treated with a Durable Water Resistant finish. Lined with warm Synchilla(R) fleece. Tall stand-up collar is insulated with PrimaLoft(R) One 60g for warmth. Raglan sleeves free up arm movement. Rib-knit cuffs and hem stretch and snug in warmth. Patagonia Shelled Synchilla jacket has zippered hand pockets and an inner chest welted pocket, all lined with brushed tricot.
short_description: A Patagonia classic, the Shelled Synchilla is a versatile bomber-style jacket made from durable, water-resistant nylon with a soft fleece lining. It'll be your spring and fall buddy for outdoor fun.
